name: Roller Madness (MarcoTTC)
description:
This a very short, but fun and difficult game where you have to avoid your enemies and catch the necessary amount of coins. Use WASD to control your character, collect the coins and avoid the enemies.

It was originally made as part of an exercise for Michigan State University Game Design and Development Specialization on Coursera, so I would like to thank both Brian Winn and Casey O'Donnell.
